metadata.title: CVE-2022-2500 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions before 15.0.5, 15.1 prior to 15.1.4, and 15.2 prior to 15.2.1.A stored XSS flaw in job error messages allows attackers to performarbitrary actions on behalf of victims at client side.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
